name: David Mike
comment: We appreciate your work in selling our house. You produced incredible results, way above our expectations! Your outstanding group of contractors worked hard and were skilled. Thanks to you and the skills of your contractors, the house transformation was magical. To summarize your efforts have meant a new start for us, not bad for a pair of 80 year olds!

name: Danny kauf
comment: Simply put we would not have the house of our dreams without Home Realtor. There is no doubt in my mind that we could have contended in this market without Home realtor's expertise and knowledge. When it comes to our heading a home they helped us think through potential issues objectively and carefully, and ensured we were truly prepared and ready for this decision.

name: Jivesh Ramaden
comment: Home Realtor is a ROCKSTAR! they went above and beyond to help us find the perfect Belmont property, and they continues to be a tremendous resource. (they definitely believe that the realtor-client relationship doesn't stop with the sale!) Plus they are fun and always upbeat and has a BIG HEART. Tey are the  one you want in your corner!
